{u'permalink': u'https://theysaidso.com/quote/alexander-masters-if-stuart-is-a-freak-it-is-because-he-has-had-the-superhuman-s', u'language': u'en', u'tags': [u'freaks', u'friendship', u'homeless', u'strength', u'stuart-shorter'], u'quote': u'If Stuart is a freak..
